item.description:
"Chime in" from 9 - 10 pm on the phone ...

- with your questions
- to get support and suggestions
- to share your LOA experiences

It was great at our April meetup to see folks share & commit to take actions daily.

Stefan Pagacik, BostonLOA member, will be on the call again to help members further clarify and define their goals & intentions and determine manageable daily action steps to take... to move powerfully closer to manifestation.

Thank you very much, Stefan ( www.greenpointma.com ), for being available for our members this evening.

Once you've RSVP'd YES, you'll get an e-mail confirmation with call-in details.
item.why: Open Forum - Bring your questions, receive suggestions, share your LOA experiences, learn from each other, get to know each other

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: BostonLOA Masterminding TELE-Meetup
